desc: Peore is India's biggest provider of nanotechnology powered water purifiers. Our purifiers uses Nanofiltration (NF) which retains healthy minerals in water & maintains it's TDS as per WHO recommendations. Unlike an RO purifier, Peore water purifiers can be selected as per your supply water quality.

layout.text: Nano-Powered Water Purifiers Tailored For You
Whatever your TDS level is, we have a solution.
